title: Data Retention and Deletion Policy
description: Defines retention windows, deletion workflows, and verification checks for user and operational data.

title: Sensitive Data Classification Standard
description: Classifies data by sensitivity and enforces handling controls for each classification level.

title: Least-Privilege Access Control Policy
description: Requires role-based access, just-in-time elevation, and periodic entitlement reviews.

title: Third-Party Integration Approval Workflow
description: Establishes mandatory security and legal review before enabling external integrations.

title: Operational Monitoring and Alerting Policy
description: Specifies baseline telemetry, alert thresholds, escalation paths, and on-call responsibilities.

title: Audit Log Integrity and Retention Policy
description: Defines tamper-evident logging, retention classes, and evidence preservation requirements.

title: Responsible AI Transparency Policy
description: Requires AI disclosure, explanation affordances, and user-facing limitations statements.

title: Bias Testing and Human Oversight Standard
description: Mandates recurring bias evaluation, high-risk review gates, and documented human override controls.
